titles.title: Yes I Will Always Love (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I would cry - I would cry That all the world might hear Oh love your God alone And make Christ all your own{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes I will always love And as I ought Tune to the praise of love my ceaseless voice Prefering love Too vast for human thought In spite of erring men Who cavil at my choice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why have I not A thousand thousand hearts Lord of my soul That they might all be Thine If Thou approve The zeal Thy smile imparts How should it ever fail Can such a fire decline{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love pure and holy Is a deathless fire Its object heavenly It must ever blaze Eternal love a God must needs inspire When once He wins the heart And fits it for His praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Self-love dismissed 'Tis then we live indeed In her embrace Death only death is found Come then one noble effort And succeed Cast off the chain of self With which thy soul is bound{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O I would cry That all the world might hear Ye self-tormentors Love your God alone Let His unequalled Excellence be dear Dear to your inmost souls And make Him all your own{/lang-eng}
